website_summaries.verdict: Remote control with one of the longest operating ranges at 100 feet. A good option for vaulted ceilings or use around the home when necessary.
pros: More advanced features offered through the button layout
Great button organization makes it easy to use right off the bat
cons: Smaller timer controls can be difficult to press without looking at the fan directly

customer_reviews.title: Melted - Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan Remote is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can give it negative 100. After working for less than two years suddenly it stopped working. Could smell nasty electronic components burning. Upon inspection, it seemed that plastic back cover of the unit which was installed outside the fan housing started melting. Took the unit apart and looks like 2 of large diodes or capacitors and some other electronic components exploded and started melting the plastic cover (see attached picture). If you have a same brand of the Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan & Lite Remote, STOP USING IT IMMEDIATELY. I intend to contact the vendor as well as federal and state agencies regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: JT-Rev6

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: The switch worked as expected. No issues. It was small enough to fit nicely within the wire assembly of the fan. A 9V battery is required for the remote and it would have been good had that been included. It really doesn't matter what brand of fan you use it with. It's just a remote that controls electrical wires.
customer_reviews.author: Xandish

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dead out of the box. I spent a few hours disassembling the ceiling fan, wiring the new control in, only to find it unresponsive to the remote. I spent another hour swapping batteries, changing codes, etc. Then spent another hour taking it all apart again. I got this shortly after moving into a new house, and unfortunately, with all the stuff going on I missed the return deadline. It would have been nice to have a little quality control at the factory. Even if I had returned it on time I would still be out several hours of labor.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Works well with LED Bulbs but make sure to follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is very easy to install. There is some confusion in the various descriptions about it being able to dim LED bulbs. IT CAN! My fan came with LED bulbs and the controller works great with them—off/on and dims very smoothly. TIP: The installation instructions tell you the manual fan switch on the pull chain must be set to HI and the light switch on the chain must be ON for the remote to work. Be sure to do this when installing the fan or you will think the remote is defective. It’s probably not but this step is very important!
customer_reviews.author: Topper

customer_reviews.title: Necessary addition to my fan/light!
customer_reviews.text: My contractor was able to mount this remote into the dual fan/light (Harbor Breeze Twin Breeze Ii 74-in Oil-rubbed Bronze Outdoor Downrod Ceiling Fan) that they installed in my living/dining room. The fan came with chain pulls that are probably 18" long, but I can't reach them without a tall step stool. This remote makes the fan so much more functional for me!
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: Helps to use dimmable or halogen bulbs
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I have an issue with flickering or flashing lights, but this is the non-dimmable bulb most likely. If you use this kit buy either halogen or dimmable LED bulbs. I ordered some dimmable bulbs and that should take care of the problem. I found the same kit at a Big Box store for a few bucks less though.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: LED bulbs don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Just a note on my experience. In the description it tells you this remote doesn't work with CFL bulbs (compact fluorescent). It apparently doesn't work with LED either as I bought 5000K bulbs so I could get more light. After 20 minutes or so the lights turned off. I pushed the light button on this remote and lights came back on for about 5 minutes and again shut off. I waited about 10 minutes or so and same thing on for a bit and off again. I checked all the wires and wire nuts with no change. I removed the receiver and direct wired my fan/fan and it works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Cew8072

customer_reviews.title: Has a lifespan of about 2 years at best.
customer_reviews.text: It is July 2019 and I bought this controller August 2017, and it is in a room where we hardly ever use the light or the fan, and it failed in less than 2 years. I will not buy another one of these and do not recommend anyone else does, unless they are just trying to make something work to sell the house. Not durable, only a temporary product.
customer_reviews.author: old-school

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Apparently per the directions this is not for an outdoor fan. We purchased this as it was paired with the outdoor fan we purchased. There is no casing to keep it from the elements. We are going to try a few things to see if we can surround it with a material to keep it from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Toss Your Fan, Fix the Remote!
customer_reviews.text: Actually it was not the remote that was bad but the the relay up in the fan. I did not want to toss my beautiful fan. I just climbed up on a ladder, took out the relay or whatever it is called, popped the new one in. It is so satisfying to make a fix like this. Tip: label your wires!
customer_reviews.author: Bluz Suns

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly acceptable replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the module I had in my fan after the dog turned the old remote into a chew toy. No more difficult to replace than the innitial product was to install. Took about 15 minutes by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Worked Like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with my small cover plate, but as you can see, it fit perfectly. It integrated well with my BOND unit so now Alexa controls my fan and lights. Update: Still working great, Still Love it. Friends and family like it too, especially when I tell alexa to turn on the fan/lights
customer_reviews.author: SirQ

customer_reviews.title: Changing the Harbor Breeze reciver was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: The replacement was exactly like the old one except for the color of the receiver which didn't matter. The package did have larger wire nuts than I had on the non-working unit. I'm not sure if the larger wire nuts came with original unit or were from a prior installation. Since space was tight, I opted to use the older, smaller wire nuts than the ones that came with replacement. It took me longer to put up everything back up into the housing than take it down and change out the unit. If you you need a replacement for your Harbor Breeze 43147 Ceiling Fan and Light, this is the ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: Harbor Breeze 43147 Ceiling Fan & Light Remote Control Kit NEW Universal
customer_reviews.text: Works the ceiling fan speeds Ok. But ONLY dims using incandescent bulbs. Will not work with LED lights! Read the fine print! Had to order another controller that works with LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Cash

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and with 2 fans in the same room, having purchased 2 of these, we no longer have crossed signals. 1 remote controls one fan, the other one controls the other fan.
customer_reviews.author: goldenhawk

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. We put it in a bedroom, used command strip to mount included remote holder to wall(didnt want screw holes in wall), and it has worked great! Usually dont have to remove from holder, and buttons are sensitive enough that you just push and you're done. Rarely have to tap a second time. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bucey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution!
customer_reviews.text: When our Harbor Breeze fan was first installed the remote did not work. We thought we wouldn't need to dim the light in that room so did nothing about it. Overtime, we regretted this decision and found the HB Universal remote. We had it installed and it works great! Definitely a good decision, one I wish we had made much earlier!
customer_reviews.author: AvidMillLakeReader

customer_reviews.title: Hums
customer_reviews.text: Operates the fan and light perfectly, but has a definite hum at all speeds. I'm not sure if I could take the sound of this thing and will perhaps replace it soon. I guess I am wondering if the next one is just going the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobiam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We had lost our remote, and didn't want to have to replace the whole fan. Very easy to swap out the control part, put it back together and we had our ceiling fan back.
customer_reviews.author: Meatcutter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing rates right up there, with sliced bread ! A lot of people fuss about it ? My guess is they had no business trying to install it ! & “my” fan-lite is controlled by wall switch, so I just put a wire nut on the blue wire from the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mike

customer_reviews.title: I had been told that it was difficult to retrofit ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been told that it was difficult to retrofit a remote to an existing fan. I bought this one and had no problems installing it (I'm reasonably handy and understand the basics of home wiring).
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Tritt

customer_reviews.title: Fixes failed remote control ceiling fans!
customer_reviews.text: If your Home Depot ceiling fan or its lights have stopped working, this is probably what you need! All the wire nuts, screws and parts are included with clear instructions. NOTE: If you installed your fan originally, you know that the WORST part of this job is getting the remote, wires and wire nuts to fit in that tiny space over the fan. If you didn't install your fan you're facing a job that generally requires a liberal amount of profanity. Just remember to keep the faith because it IS possible. (-:
customer_reviews.author: Kent Davis

customer_reviews.title: Remote control convenience
customer_reviews.text: Got these to go with our new fan, the Harbor Breeze Twin Breeze Ii 74-in Oil-rubbed Bronze Outdoor Downrod Ceiling Fan, since the switch for this electrical connection is not conveniently located. They integrated seamlessly and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cport911

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control
customer_reviews.text: The Harbor Breeze remote control allows us to turn the fan on/off from inside the house. This will be a great feature in the summer so we can cool of the screened in porch before going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed two weeks ago. It was easy to install and works perfectly, as intended.
customer_reviews.author: MCHernan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Harbor Breeze Flush mount fan . Fits well. Works just as advertised. And I liked, so I purchased 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive item pictured.
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered and what I got are not the same. I had family coming in for the holidays so I had to go with the remote I received. It works fine except that it defaults to "off" whenever the wall switch is turned off. This means that every time you switch the wall switch back on you have to use the remote to turn the light on. This is a royal pain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broke after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 9 months, although we only occasionally used it. After 9 months the remote stopped communicating with the base. Changing batteries didn't help and I even checked to make sure the programming switches were in sync with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ben & Jes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled, easy to follow directions and install was a snap! So far so good with operation. I store the remote inside garage, about 13 feet from outside fan... works from that that location. Happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my fan
customer_reviews.text: Used this to fix a broken fan. Works as expected
customer_reviews.author: cjfman

customer_reviews.title: Useless to buy with the fan it was reccommended for
customer_reviews.text: Order place with outdoor Harbor Breeze 2 motor fan. Instructions advise will not work with the high amperage and specifically it CANNOT BR USED OUTDOIRS OR IN HUMID CONDITIONS. Useless to buy with the fan it was reccommended for.
customer_reviews.author: AL ZINK

customer_reviews.title: I only used the remote, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly right out of the box - after I inserted the battery, of course. I didn't need the receiver but I bought the whole kit JUST IN CASE. It was a cost effective repair.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Frieders

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured. Bought for Harbor Breeze fan when ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. Bought for Harbor Breeze fan when we lost the remote that came with our fan. Ended up just going to Lowe's and buying one of their generic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep 1

customer_reviews.title: Remote is a little larger than I would have liked but at least it works perfectly with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Did what it’s aupposed to do. Remote is a little larger than I would have liked but at least it works perfectly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Direct swap with the original.  Easy to configure the frequency with DIP switches.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install. Direct swap with the old one. It took longer to remove the cover of the fan and hold the fan than to install the unit. Four wire nuts and tape. Overall installation was only about 10 minutes including the fumbling with the fan.
customer_reviews.author: curlyq

customer_reviews.title: Not a brand new retail product.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was a used/not new. The wire nuts were all mismatched. The hand held fan control did not work. Fortunate for me I had an older controller that did work.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Craig

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because my current remote was worn out ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my current remote was worn out. I programmed the frequency of the new remote to match the worn out one and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: My fault for not reading the description better.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, fashionable looks. Only complaint is that I thought the LED lights would be dimmable. They are not. My fault for not reading the description better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Harrow

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Going on 1 year and use this remote everyday. No complaints, yet. Addendum: Year 2 and still works great! I haven't even had to change the remote batteries yet and I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love the dimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. If you're familiar with installing ceiling fans, you will find this remote easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: After trying to fit this into fan base for an ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying to fit this into fan base for an hour I finally gave up and it's in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of these in my home and they all work fantastic. Just set the dip switches to different settings ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these in my home and they all work fantastic. Just set the dip switches to different settings for each room and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: gadget geek

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement system for one from Lowes that quit working after four years. So far this is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Couple

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty easy install (if you’ve done a fan installation before) ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty easy install (if you’ve done a fan installation before) and makes a fan that didn’t work work again!
customer_reviews.author: Team Geofrog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Turns on the light with the "high" button. Turns off the light with the "low" and "off" button. Light button does nothing. No buttons turn on the fan. Everything is hooked up correctly it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use with the double fan and it was very easy to follow the instructions and to install.
customer_reviews.author: Anaily E Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: convinience at your hand
customer_reviews.text: this are great, my old one (10 years old) finally stopped working so been able to find this replacements is great...wish someone would just sell the transmitter as usually the receiver still works.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Colon

customer_reviews.title: exact replacement...good job
customer_reviews.text: This item was an exact replacement for my Harbor Breeze remote fan control module,plus the controller..perfect fit...perfect works
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to replace our fan's broken remote. We have a Turn-of-the-Century fan and this worked with it, they are all pretty much universal at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works to replaced my dead one. I didn't have dimmable LEDs so sometimes my light will flicker
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised. If only I had remembered how ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. If only I had remembered how to take the fan apart I would have been don even quicker! Daughter loves having a remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Gath

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and arrive on time. Item worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nancy Dwire

customer_reviews.title: Operates fine some difficulty in getting unit in fan due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Operates fine some difficulty in getting unit in fan due to lack of space, has become loose and causes a ticking noice at slow speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Direct swap.  quick and easy swap.
customer_reviews.text: direct replacement to my 10 year old remote that died. quick and easy swap,
customer_reviews.author: Ivan E.

customer_reviews.title: Remote
customer_reviews.text: Good product, though the low and medium speed control for the fan is way too low. Will report back after some usage.
customer_reviews.author: K_GSR

customer_reviews.title: was intended for CFL lights,
customer_reviews.text: was intended for CFL lights, according to the description " all kinds of Fans " no indication not for CFL ~ send it back
customer_reviews.author: GH FL

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always work with the first push of the button
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fan and light would go on at any time.Changed the settings and still the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know how to wire electricty.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, works greate, all my fans have one. Came fast good seller.Thanks john
customer_reviews.author: Homie

customer_reviews.title: Minimal Quality Assurance
customer_reviews.text: Replacement of the prior receiver was necessary, and was quite simple. After installation, I discovered the remote transmitter had been incorrectly wired, where #2 was actually HIGH and #3 was MEDIUM fan speed. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not a unversal remote it does not work in our fan as it said it would
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Remote for ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought many months ago, just finally got someone to install to replace previous one. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jayarr

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Began to suspect a bad sensor after a battery change for the remote did nothing. $25 for new remote and sensor was a lot better than $200 plus for a new fan. Repair only took about 20 minutes. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing I’ve bought!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing I’ve bought in a while. Worked perfectly and made life easier for my handicapped mother!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for our fan/light in our living room! Not too bad of a price either
customer_reviews.author: C D H

customer_reviews.title: Handicapped accessibility
customer_reviews.text: Works great, solves the fan/light access problem for my handicapped wife. Makes for a tight fit for the receiver along with the wiring but the end result is worth it. Ordering another unit now for another fan.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new house with two fans that had lost remotes Bought one to try it out and it works well the other unfortunately couldn’t work with my other fan so I returned it and the returning process was really easy and I got my money back. Nonetheless I’m very satisfied with my first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: on the firs time i use work very good and then i have a problems dosent work
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly so I could keep the ceiling fan I already had and now have a remote that works!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Beach

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect but they should make smaller so it can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect but they should make smaller so it can fit more freely in the small space where is supposed to be installed about the fan
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great this is the second one I've ordered.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Not a light dimmer
customer_reviews.text: The light is on/off only. It is NOT a dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the installation instructions were a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: R.P. 164 in Mo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and easy to install retro fit for one of my outdoor fans.
customer_reviews.author: Larryfromthecorner

customer_reviews.title: is it harbor breeze? or some knock off brand
customer_reviews.text: works great easy to install don't really know the brand but good deal
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: it worked!
customer_reviews.text: totally worked to replace my missing remote. Easy to program
customer_reviews.author: Trago Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Harbor breeze replacement remote works
customer_reviews.text: Dog chewed up the old remote. I matched the dipsticks to the old one and it works perfectly. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Big Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great full range dimmer and fan control
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time making searching for LED bulbs to use with this dimmer  is the only style I have found over three years that doesn't have a HUGE drawback. These ones are flawless and will dim as expected. not buzz and wont flash or flicker. If you are an energy hog than incandescent will work fine. I'm sure there are some CFLs out there that will dim with this but I wouldn't bother looking as the lifespan of CFL does not compare with LED.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my problem where the fan just unexpectedly stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my problem where the fan just unexpectedly stopped working; both the blades and the light. Was a far less costly fix than ordering and installing a new fan.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Made operation of the fan "a breeze". I'll order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Paul

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted. I've ordered a number of these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement control
customer_reviews.text: Works great; replaced the failed original control in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Glbbritt

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Took only 5 minutes to install, and works perfectly in my office!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: worked great.
customer_reviews.text: tight fit installing in enclosure but once hooked up, worked great.

customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 months. Warranty is for only 3 months.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement product. Easy to install, works like a charm!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It solve our problem of our fan sometimes not working.

customer_reviews.text: It installs easy and works well. Remote could be slightly sexier, but it does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit and and awesome fan again!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was perfect to bring our fan back to life! Perfect fit!

customer_reviews.text: Worked well after I hooked it up - met my expectations.

customer_reviews.text: Works well! Not too hard to install. Will see how it stands up to Michigan winter.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months. I contacted this company but they refuse to help citing 30 warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was brand new and when I installed, it worked the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan speed doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Fan only works on one speed - slow and that is if Fast is pressed. Slow and Med barely moves it at all. Light works fine. Previous/original worked fine for about 1 year. Very disappointed. I took it down and re-checked everything. It seems that the circuits are too light for the 5 blade 48 inch fan.
customer_reviews.author: hleejpn

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement, priced right, hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.text: This is a direct factory replacement part that is used by many different brand names of fans. IMPORTANT NOTE: Before you order, you need to know that there are two basic types of these remotes. They look identical except this unit has THREE wires on the output side (one each for fan and light and neutral), not TWO like others have. Save yourself some grief, verify before you order. This was priced fairly and worked perfectly. Amazon shipped it next day, a lot easier than trekking to home improvement store that probably does not stock this model anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Grunz

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine.  Wish it wasn't a 9V battery.
customer_reviews.text: Installed and worked fine. My biggest gripe is the need for a 9V battery...really rather old-fashioned and relatively expensive. BTW, as received, it literally was hardly packaged; just everything put in a plastic bag...which is not an issue unless "presentation" mattered to you.
customer_reviews.author: Larry in FL

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for existing fan - Hampton Bay 52" Triton ...
customer_reviews.text: Direct replacement for existing fan - Hampton Bay 52" Triton If your receiver/remote begins to fail to respond to the light (light stays on no matter what you do and possibly blows a bulb when the issue starts) then you probably need this item.
customer_reviews.author: DingoGringo

product_meta.title: Harbor Breeze 43147 Ceiling Fan & Light Remote Control Kit NEW Universal
product_meta.description: This kit is specifically made for Hampton Bay and Harbor Breeze fans but works with almost all regular ceiling fans Fan button controls 3-speeds (high/medium/low);Light dimmer button controls the brightness of the light Easy installation-compact receiver fits in canopy Operates up to 40ft distance A convenient wall mounted holder is included Note: seasonal changes of forward and reverse cannot be changed with remote Features are as follows....... High, medium and low speeds plus instant off button Full range fan light dimmer (only to be used with Incandescent Light Bulbs) CFL will not work with this kit Easy installation-compact receiver fits in canopy Operates up to 40ft distance Works with most ceiling fan brands UL listed/FCC certified Works on vaulted ceilings Will not work on "hugger style" fans Can be used in indoors or outdoor locations
